name: Your Demons: Chapter 0
description:
Hello and welcome everyone to the early access of Your Demons: Chapter 0
It's an action-RPG set in an urban contemporary world, mainly focused on gang wars.
Since we are still beta testing it and solving some bugs and gameplay issues, we will release a new version next year bug solved and fully translated (and with language localisation!).
Here's a brief list of what you need to know about the gameplay:
- You have no life points except your TOXIC level, wich means one or few shots and you are dead, same with the enemies.
- Your objective is to eliminate a guy upstairs from where you start, sitting on a table in this restaurant with two guards protecting him, armed only with pistols.
You have different ways to kill him, one of which is poisoning his pizza.
- There are 3 areas: Restaurant, Streets and Bar Ultima Thule.
- Look around for weapons and boosts, even in car's trunks.
- Don't forget to open your inventory by pressing I to equip your weapons and equipment (descriptions are still in italian, we apologize and we'll fix it as soon as we can).
- There are three firearms: pistol, coachgun and grenade launcher
- Six melee weapons: Knife, Pig's Leg, Butcher Knife, Pizza Shovel, Baseball Bat, and your own fists.
They have unique movesets. Press RMB, LMB and Q to unleash the beast!
- Drugs you can find (joints, shrooms, cocaine, alcoholic beverages) will raise your toxic level, which protects you from shots but if you reach 5 you will faint and die. To lower your Toxic level smoke some nicotine. You'll also find poison and Laxative.
- There are not many of this items so you have to look around for them!
!LIST OF BUGS!
- Sometimes the Target doesn't phisically appear and his guards gets stuck in Idle after you shoot them.
- You have to open your inventory after each area change to re-equip your items.
- If you have issues with equipped items not working (you have two or more items in one hand and none of them is working) change area.
- Loading screen, subtitles from the starting TV and dialogues still in italian.
- You may find more than one coachgun.
- Visual Effects from Drugs disappear while changin area, not the Toxic level.
- If the Target's missing, try the ending pizza poisoning.
- If you are experiencing FPS drops (we still have to figure the requirements), please contact us, and go on SETTINGS > SCALABILITY and set it to 1, it's the lowest setting for graphics.
- We still have to add settings like audio control, keybindings, graphics...
- We also have to make a fully functional leaderboard system to register all your scores.
IF you are experiencing other bugs, please contact us so we can fix them.
Hope you'll enjoy it!
